Label: SC_EXPANDED_EMERGENCY
Comment: "116 111 is set up for counselling and referral services in Saudi Arabia, not emergency\ncases."

Label: SC_STANDARD_RATE
Comment: "This is listed on\nhttp://www.mobily.com.sa/portalu/wps/portal/personal/services/video-and-voice-calls/voice-mail/?lang=en\nas costing 25 per minute. The normal mobile rate for calls is 10-30."

Label: SC_TOLL_FREE
Comment: "http://www.childhelplineinternational.org/media/40652/speaker_3_-_saudi_arabia__2_.pdf\nsays that 116111 is free. http://www.arabnews.com/news/451698 talks about 937 being\ntoll free."

Label: XML_PREMIUM_RATE
Comment: "Contains shared revenue range 925, as calling these numbers involve charges from carrier\nand the organization that you are calling."

Label: XML_UAN
Comment: "Including ""Nomadic"" numbers from the Telecom Company ""Go"". ""Go"" says these are fixed-line\nthat can be moved with no further setup. As these are mobile in nature and UAN is the\nclosest match, adding it here."
